name: Pods Framework 2.0
body:
### Authors and Contributos
Scott Kingsley Clark (@sc0ttkclark), Matt Gibbs (@logikal16), and Mike Green (@mikedamage).

### About
Check out http://podsframework.org/ for our User Guide and many other resources to help you develop with Pods.

### Pods 2.0 Alpha
All testing information including features and directions can be found at http://dev.podscms.org/
tagline: Pods Framework is a Content Development Framework for WordPress
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
